attributes.additional_details:
The HSBC secure key is causing misery for thousands of law abiding citizens trying to get by in life.
It is a waste of time that could be spent with family, friends or at work.
The deceit that HSBC claim that it increases security is equivalent to saying Saddam Hussein was a just leader.
The device breaks down every time it is used.
It is a dictatorial system and oppresses the innocent.
HSBC do not listen to the people that it serves and by default makes it equivalent to a regime worthy of new leadership.
My word reflect the thousands of unheard people who are striving to make ends meat.
